system.description:
You have a Heraldic Banner that’s made from a 10ft (3m) pole with an attached 2ft x 4ft (60cm x 120cm) flag.

The banner bears the emblem of your group, guild, faction, kingdom, or other affiliated organization.

A creature can spend 1 AP to plant or pick up the banner on the ground within 1 Space.

 

Display Banner

You must display a Banner for a creature to benefit from its presence. You can display the banner by carrying it with at least 1 free hand or by planting it on the ground.

The banner is not considered on display while it’s lying on the ground, in the possession of an enemy creature, or its emblem is defaced or torn.

Banner Aura: While your banner is on display, it has an aura that extends 5 Spaces in each direction. 

Banner Actions

While your banner is on display, you can take 1 of the follow Banner Actions:

@UUID[Compendium.dc20rpg.classes.Item.OCXDjuG7khpwg42E]{Bolster}

@UUID[Compendium.dc20rpg.classes.Item.Q2kfvagJSfH8vBTp]{Rally}

@UUID[Compendium.dc20rpg.classes.Item.rBpKf3oS06qBIoIy]{Reinforce}

 

Replacing the Banner
If you ever lose your Heraldic Banner, you can have a new crafted for 5g in most towns.

Alternatively, you can spend 2g for the materials and make it yourself.

You can attempt to craft a new Banner once during each Long Rest by using Weaver’s Tools and succeeding a DC 15 Weaving Check.

Multiple Banners

If you have multiple Banners, one of them is considered your Heraldic Banner for the purpose of game effects, and any additional Banners you create are just considered normal flags. If your Heraldic Banner is ever lost, defaced, or destroyed, you can choose one of your additional Banners to become your new Heraldic Banner.
